sub_title: Vice President and Head of Finance and SCM Brachy Solutions at Elekta
summary:
I get most energy from challenges. I am always striving for improvements (quality, effectiveness, efficiency, usefulness etc.). I have worked in a demanding environment and this can be in all industries (e.g. newspaper-, chemical or medical device companies). I get things done.

VP Global Manufacturing, VP Operations, CFO and Concern Controller for both publicly listed companies and companies held by private equity (national and international companies), responsible for:
- Management Team
- Strategy development and execution
- Accounting and Controlling
- Purchasing and facilities
- Leading Operations (manufacturing, planning, inventory management, product and manufacturing engineering)
- Leading Global manufacturing
- Lifecycle Management
- Management Information (analysis and reporting)
- External Information (annual report (IFRS))
- Strategic Planning, Budget, Rolling Forecast
- Tax

profile_positions.description:
Elekta AB develops state-of-the-art equipment and treatment planning systems for radiation therapy, including brachytherapy and radiosurgery, as well as workflow enhancing software systems across the spectrum of cancer care. Elekta AB has a turnover of €1.2 bn and 3,800 FTE. The Business Line Brachy Solutions (BLBS) is 1 of the 5 business lines in Elekta AB. 
Based in Veenendaal, I am responsible for Finance and Supply Chain Management for BLBS. The responsibilities contain Business Controlling, Purchasing, Manufacturing, Logistics and Manufacturing Engineering. Next to that, I am Managing Director of the Nucletron Operations B.V. I am responsible for about 90 FTE.
I am reporting to the CEO of the Business Line Brachy Solutions and the CFO of Elekta AB and part of the BLBS MT.

As VP and Head of Finance and SCM I am responsible for: 
-	Member MT BLBS
-	Strategic Planning, Budgeting, Rolling Forecast BLBS
-	`Controlling, Procurement, Manufacturing, Logistics and Manufacturing Engineering
-	Managing current and developing new supplier relationships
-	Mergers and Acquisitions and Investments
-	Strategic and Tactical Planning and Operational execution of the Supply Chain
-	Managing Director Nucletron Operations B.V.
profile_positions.title: Vice President and Head of Finance and SCM Brachy Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Based in Veenendaal, I am responsible for all global manufacturing locations of Elekta AB. On the three main sites I am responsible for only manufacturing. The three sites are Veenendaal (NL), Beijing (China) and Crawley (London/UK). About 230 FTE work here in manufacturing under my responsibility (functionally and hierarchically). I am also responsible for all activities on one multifunctional site, Schwabmünchen (Germany). In 2 other sites, Montreal (Canada) and St Louis (USA), I am responsible for all Supply Chain & Manufacturing activities. In these 3, not only manufacturing sites, I am responsible for about 80 FTE.
I am reporting to the COO and part of the SC&M MT.

As VP Global Manufacturing responsible for: 
-	Added value of about €20 M 
-	Responsible for the following departments in every of the 3 main sites: Planning and Operational Purchasing, Production, Manufacturing Engineering (incl Lean), Quality Control, Warehousing
-	Strategic and Tactical planning and Operational execution 

Most important projects:
-	Realise global aligned Manufacturing Centers of Excellence instead of separate manufacturing sites
-	Setting up globally aligned manufacturing Strategy
-	Aligned Organisation chart and KPI Dashboard
-	Introducing and setting up a Manufacturing Execution System (MES)
-	Setting up new manufacturing line in China for Linear Accelerators (RT Equipment)
-	Realised over 15% efficiency in 3 years
-	Substantially improved quality
profile_positions.title: VP Global Manufacturing

profile_positions.description:
Nucletron B.V. / Business Area Brachytherapy Solutions (BABS) is active in innovative brachy cancer treatment and has a turnover of €130 M and employs 420 FTE. BABS is part of Elekta AB with a turnover of €1.2 bn and 3,800 FTE. Based in Veenendaal about 80 FTE work in Operations & Services under my responsibility (functionally and hierarchically). The business is run in a Matrix organisational format. In Operations & Services (OPS) responsible for:
-	Member Management Team BABS 
-	Member Project Steering Group new products
-	Leading the departments: strategic and operational procurement, supplier quality assurance, Lean Six Sigma, manufacturing planning, manufacturing, inventory management, order fulfilment, manufacturing- and product engineering, lifecycle management and strategic alliances
-	BABS and Operations strategy development and execution
-	Total Supply Chain 
-	Customer satisfaction

Most important projects and key achievements:
-	Contributing to execution of BABS strategy (maintaining current business and developing new business)
-	Setting up effective and efficient manufacturing organisation / fit for the future by means of Lean Six Sigma techniques
-	Increasing customer satisfaction
-	People development / change management
-	Improving processes and collaboration within Operations & Sevices but also with departments R&D, Marketing and Sales
-	Improving quality and awareness / being audit proof for FDA and Dekra audits
-	Contracting several key strategic partners; developing second source suppliers; harmonizing supply base, managing current and developing future supplier relations
-	Setting up management reporting within OPS

profile_positions.description:
New Nucletron Company B.V. is an independent company, held by private equity and active in manufacturing and sales of medical equipment in radiotherapy. Turnover €140 M and 520 FTE; worldwide orientation and responsible for (functionally and hierarchically) 12 FTE and functionally for 50 FTE in Finance & Control (F&C) worldwide, reporting to CFO. Responsible for:
-	Supporting CFO and CEO
-	Accounting and Controlling, including internal control
-	Management Information (analysis and reporting) and reporting to Management, Private Equity, Executive Board of Directors and Banking consortium
-	Reporting externally e.g. annual report (IFRS) and assuring unqualified opinion
-	Strategic Plan, Budget and Rolling Forecast 
-	Risk Management
-	Tax / Treasury / Cash Management / Insurances
-	Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A) and investment decisions

Most important projects and key achievements:
Selling New Nucletron Company B.V. through a regulated auction to Elekta AB from January 2011 until September 2011. Responsible for Financial due diligence, Tax and Legal due diligence, Q&A and coordinating questions antitrust agencies. 
Reorganising the financial organisation and set up of accounting policies and budgeting and reporting metrics according to new structure, including a transition towards the new ERP. In April 2012 I finished the merger and sales of 20 legal entities into 2 legal entities. 
Administration certificate foundation and its dismantling (calculation shareprice, finalising payments to certificate holders).
